title: As a ______main, my favorite sound is ______.
body: BONUS ROUND!: As a ______main, my most hated sound is ______.

replies.body: As a {{champion:99}} main, my favorite sound is me spamming laugh after dodging an enemy ult. :3
reported

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zruzO7F2,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2015-01-21T19:59:41.329+0000)
>
> As a {{champion:99}} main, my favorite sound is me spamming laugh after dodging an enemy ult. :3

I...hate...Lux's...laugh...so...much... It's so obnoxious. lol

Can you guess? :3

http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2010/325/7/c/nidalee_comic_by_makani-d33clrl.jpg
As a {{champion:31}} main, my favorite sound is OMNOMNOMNOMNOM
As a {{champion:83}}  main, I dig {{champion:104}} .
As a {{champion:161}} main (not rly),  i see what you did their.
{{champion:64}} I don't.

As a {{champion:268}} main, my favorite sound is my ULT vs. a bad {{champion:103}} 's ult


{{champion:103}} "Ha!" -dashes into wall-

-BONK-

{{champion:103}} "Hu!" -dashes into wall-

-BONK-

{{champion:103}} "nerf azi-" -dashes into wall-
As a pigeon {{champion:268}} main, my most hated sounds are from fugging eagles{{champion:34}}.

As an {{champion:6}} main, my favorite sound is "Eternal life... endless torture." then the absence of chat going off like crazy raging about troll picks, etc...
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
As a Renekton main, my favorite sound is {{summoner:12}} --> "triple kill"
Dude you're everywhere

Step 1) go to Boards home
Step 2) set ordering to new
Step 3) look at as much incoming Boards posts as possible. Otherwise known as ~60% of it at any time.

As a {{champion:89}} main, my favorite sound is "Enemy Slain" followed by "Ever Vigilant".

My most hated sound is whatever the heck Lulu says when she polymorphs me...
As a {{champion:24}} main my favourite sound is **WHOMP**
As a {{champion:35}} main, my favorite sound is Lee Sin's death noise.
As a Support main, my favorite sound is {{champion:412}} 's auto-attacks.
As a Lee Sin main, my favorite sound is the sobbing of people foolish enough to main any other jungler as they are rendered inviable time and time again and I'm still LEE FREAKIN' SIN.
As any champion, my most hated sound is {{champion:92}} s stupid grunts after she does anything.

{{champion:4}}   its destiny.  giddy up, eyes wide open.
pretty much anything that comes out {{champion:4}} mouth.
As a {{champion:45}} main, my favorite sound is 3 spells hitting their carry at once.
As a {{champion:56}} my favorite sound is silence. Literally, I turn off the master sound.
As a {{champion:82}}  main, my favorite sound is the chime of gold as I *E* the entire minion wave

WOAH! Okay, I think its time I contribute.

As a {{champion:45}}  main, my favorite sounds is "WOULD YOU KINDLY STOP MOVING?!" (I use the final boss skin)

As a {{champion:45}}  main, my least favorite sound is whatever a prowling  {{champion:7}}  sounds like.

As a {{champion:103}} main my favorite sound is charm landing.
As a {{champion:103}} main my most hated sound is her dying.
As a Sona main, my favorite sound is the removed skeletons of my enemies dancing to my music

As a {{champion:90}} main my favorite sound is the sound of space AIDS spreading.
Most hated would probably be whatever sound the enemy jungler might make.
As a shyvana main, my favorite sound is "RAAAAWWWWRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

*Is surprised no one has made the ahri death noise joke*
As a zac main my favorite sound is {{champion:154}} "GO BIG OR GO HOME!"  Followed by "Godlike"

As a {{champion:76}} main my favorite sound is tink!

As a {{champion:76}} main my most hated sound is {{item:3157}}

As a {{champion:238}} , my favorite sound is the sound of the death mark going off
As a {{champion:238}} , my most hated sound is the sound of a {{item:3157}} going off.

Good. Zed is cancer. =P
As a {{champion:55}} main my favorite sound is PENTAKILL
As a {{champion:86}} main, my favorite sound is DEMACIA!!!!!
As a {{champion:107}} main, my favorite sound is my Q sinking into a squishy carry~
As a {{champion:114}} main, my favorite sound is that of my Burst of Speed followed by a Ravenous Hydra cancel leading up to a 3 man ultimate-triple kill.

as a zed main my favorite sound is that moment of silence right before your death mark triggers and gives you the kill

it feels so satisfying

As a {{champion:114}} main, my favorite sound is spamming "Submit! You have already lost," after an enemy laner has been slain by me because I know for damn sure them trying to overcome me will be hell.
As a {{champion:53}} {{item:3078}} main my favorite sound is my enemies  raging after they think I do no damage but then I kill them all then say beep boop in all chat

As someone who doesn't really have a main but enjoys playing Mages:

When playing {{champion:112}} My favorite sound is Creator Viktor's E. It sounds like they took a reaper from Mass Effect and miniaturized it.

When playing {{champion:268}} my favorite sound is SHURIMA.
As a {{champion:89}} main, my favorite sound is my opponent's {{summoner:4}} -- right into where I planted my ultimate a moment before.

As a {{champion:106}} Main, my favorite sound is *CHOMP*

and my most hated sound is {{summoner:14}}

As a {{champion:157}} main, my favorite sound is WASABI.

As a {{champion:157}} main, my most hated sound is when a targeted projectile goes straight through Wind Wall and slaps me in the face.

As a League of Legends main, my favor sound is the Launch button. 

BECAUSE NOTHING WILL GET ME MORE PUMPED FOR SOME ACTION
As a {{champion:82}} main, my favorite sound is Huehuehue and the noise he makes when you press E.
As an {{champion:103}} main, my favorite is sound is the charm poofing on a blind shot into the fog of war.

As a ... well I don't really have a main but my most hated sound is anything from Zilean's kit. I hear his noises and I instinctively try to kill him. 
So many wasted skillshots when he's on my team.

As a {{champion:99}} main, my favorite sound is the 'pop' her passive makes when it's detonated.

My most hated sound is her laugh.  Although I do try and weaponize it when I can.
